auto_extract_enabled.hint: When enabled, the plugin guides LLM to call the bookkeeping tool automatically.

whitelist_enabled.hint: When enabled, only users in whitelist_user_ids can use auto bookkeeping and query commands.

whitelist_admin_bypass.hint: Admins are allowed even if whitelist is enabled.

whitelist_user_ids.hint: A list of sender IDs allowed to use this plugin.

max_records.hint: Old records are dropped when this limit is exceeded.

max_report_items.hint: Limit the number of lines shown in daily/monthly bill output.

daily_report_enabled.hint: Send daily bill automatically at daily_report_time.

monthly_report_enabled.hint: Send monthly bill automatically at monthly_report_day monthly_report_time.

schedule_timezone.hint: IANA timezone, for example Asia/Shanghai. Empty means system timezone.
